short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add custom colors to Google Calendar events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to customize the color of Google Calendar events based on event names. 

Note: To set the colors for your calendar events go to the extension options or click on the extension.
